activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:
HealthSTAR Communications  information (HealthSTAR Communications  as data controller): 
 
• On-line data: HealthSTAR Communications collects personal information through its websites, including without limitation in connection with, downloads of materials and registration for services. HealthSTAR Communications maintains this information and performs analyses against it in order to perform various client services activities pursuant to its contractual requirements for its clients. 
 
HealthSTAR Communications as processor: HealthSTAR Communications act as processor of personal information received from EU/EEA/and or Switzerland.  HealthSTAR Communications processes personal information at the direction of its Clients, which is the data controller and is responsible for providing notices to and obtaining required consents from data subjects. HealthSTAR Communications does not control these data and any access to or use of such data is incidental to completing its contractual requirements for the clients. 
 
See Privacy Policy Effective: on HealthSTARcom.com: July 7, 2002.
